pages.text: The Laser Wrench is primarily used to connect multiple Blocks together.$(br2)$(l:laserio:laser_node)Nodes$(/l) and $(l:laserio:laser_connector)Connectors$(/l) can be connected by Shift-RightClicking to select a block, and then right clicking another block to form a connecion.$(br2)The max connection range is 8 blocks.

pages.title: Laser Wrench
pages.text: The currently selected block is highlighted green.

Linking Nodes one by one after you placed them can be tedious; luckily the Laser Wrench can automatically do that for you!$(br2)While placing Nodes, holding the Laser Wrench in your offhand automatically connects each node to the previously placed one!$(br2)Note: this feature works with (Advanced) Laser Connectors as well!
